protein.general_function: Involved in inositol or phosphatidylinositol phosphatase activity
protein.specific_function: Major isoenzyme hydrolyzing the calcium-mobilizing second messenger Ins(1,4,5)P3, this is a signal-terminating reaction.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: De Smedt F, Verjans B, Mailleux P, Erneux C: Cloning and expression of human brain type I inositol 1,4,5-trisphosphate 5-phosphatase. High levels of mRNA in cerebellar Purkinje cells. FEBS Lett. 1994 Jun 20;347(1):69-72.
